title: Where is my border?
body: So I climbed into plat last season, the highest I've ever been, and was looking forward to the border however it doesn't show up in loading screen. I see my other teammate's borders but mine isn't there. Does it possibly have anything to do with a 14 day suspension I received 5 months ago?

replies.body:
The following list of situations would disqualify you from ranked rewards for the 2016 Season:

> * Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.
* Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Dang, 3 months.... :/ I know you probably aren't too involved in making policy for this but personally, I feel my suspension was a little harsh in the first place and now no season rewards. having played for 5 years and this is my first real ban (i've had chat restrictions before), it just seems severe
How do you get banned for boosting?
